value:
I agree with Edelgard—if we disavow
the value of Crests, we can end the
special status of Fódlan nobles.

Life is short. I can't afford to let even
a moment of mine go to waste.

I'm not sure what it is, exactly, but
something about your presence
reminds me of my professor.

Does this dress make me look as
refined as I feel? Hey, I asked you
a question! Where are you going?!

Askr's sweets are amazing. I mean,
I heard...from a friend...that they're
great. And that they're good for you!

Good to meet you. I am Lysithea.
I am here to check on you at
$Nf's request.
The natural result of superior effort.
This won't do. I need to aim higher.

It would be childish of me to sulk
over something like this.
Wise decision. You've got potential.

I am Lysithea von Ordelia. With
introductions out of the way...show
me to your library. My need is urgent.

Time may pass at the same rate for
all, but not everyone gets the same
amount of it.$k$pI can't control how much time I have.
I can only decide what to do with
what I'm given.$k$pIf my time is shorter than others',
then it would be a waste to spend
any of it grieving.$k$pNo—it merely means I must
accomplish more with less.$k$pTo that end, I plan to learn all I can
in Askr. For my parents, and for my
friends...I plan to achieve great things.
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
Begone!
Don't waste my time!
Did you think I'd miss?
Die with your regrets.
No... Not yet...
*sigh*
I am Lysithea von Ordelia. Please do not forget it.
I don't play childish games.
I've grown a lot these past few years. I'm much taller now!
I make it a point to dress in a tastefully mature way. It's worth the time.
No, I haven't eaten any cake today. Why? There is no frosting on my face...is there?!
Think of all I could achieve...if I only had more time.
You bring out the best in us. Just like a professor I once had.
Always accurate.
Really?
Let's make this quick.
